original_title: A/L classes for this year’s O/L students to begin on Jun. 4
original_body_lines: The Ministry of Education says that G.C.E. Advanced Level classes for the students who sat for the G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examination this year, will commence on June 04, 2024.
The circular to this effect has already been issued by the Education Ministry to education authorities of all provinces.
